Bookkeeping & Finance
Bookkeeping & Finance

Welcome to the Finance Department of the City of Wills Point. We’ve included some helpful documents for you on this page. Should you have any questions, please contact us using the information above.

The City of Wills Point is currently using Tyler Technologies ERP Pro 10  Software for our accounting and Utility Software programs. We work hard to maintain a balanced budget each year and are working to improve our City’s infrastructure each year by being as proactive as possible. Our council has approved the attached Budget for the FY2024 which will allow the city to make some much needed improvements to our Parks, Streets and Utilities Departments.

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
